content.rendered:
Convenient Apple Pay Processing
Payment Service in Los Angeles

Give your customers a convenient, secure way to pay using their
iPhones with Apple Pay credit card processing. 

Free Quote
Contact Sales

Fast Transactions

Get more people in and out faster with contactless payments that take only seconds to process. 

Exceptional Security

Customer data is tokenized, encrypted, and constantly changing, giving your customers peace of mind. 

No Addional Fees

If you have an NFC-enabled system, you can accept Apple Pay at the same rate as your other contactless payments. 

Convient

Our Apple Pay processing service in Los Angeles works with your existing payment system. Just add an NFC terminal if you don’t already have one! 

A Comprehensive Mobile Wallet for Apple Users

Apple Pay provides a convenient and secure way for your customers to pay using their iPhone, Apple Watch, or other compatible device. There’s no more convenient way to pay, and adding Apple Pay to your business model may help grow your business by attracting those customers who prefer contactless payment. This system integrates with your existing NFC-enabled system, so you can quickly and easily get set up with Apple Pay credit card processing. 

What hardware do I need to accept Apple Pay?

Accepting Apple Pay requires NFC-enabled hardware, also known as a contactless reader. These devices are designed to communicate with Apple devices like iPhones and Apple Watches using near field communication. Dynamic Merchant Solutions can ensure you have the correct hardware for Apple Pay and all of your contactless payments. 

01 02

Merchant Services in
Los Angeles

Whether you are processing payments in-store, online, or keyed in a virtual terminal, you’ll get the best rates with Dynamic Merchant Solutions.
Get Your Custom Rate
No application or setup fees
No hidden fees
24/7 customer services
